mapper.sql: id, user_id, order_sn, order_status, consignee, mobile, address, goods_price, freight_price, coupon_id, coupon_price, integral_price, order_price, actual_price, pay_id, pay_status,pay_type, pay_time, ship_sn, ship_channel, ship_start_time, ship_end_time, confirm_time, end_time, add_time,get_store_id, deleted
mapper.select:
select
distinct
t1.id, t1.user_id, t1.order_sn, t1.order_status, t1.consignee, t1.mobile, t1.address, t1. goods_price, t1.freight_price, t1.coupon_price,t1.coupon_id, t1.integral_price, t1.order_price, t1.actual_price, t1.pay_id, t1.pay_status,t1.pay_type, t1.ship_sn, t1.ship_channel, t1.ship_start_time, t1.ship_end_time, t1.confirm_time, t1.end_time, t1.add_time,t1.get_store_id, date_format(t1.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "payTimeDisp", date_format(t1.ship_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "shipStartTimeDisp", date_format(t1.ship_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "shipEndTimeDisp", date_format(t1.confirm_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "confirmTimeDisp", date_format(t1.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "endTimeDisp", date_format(t1.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS "addTimeDisp", t1.deleted,t2.username as "username" from litemall_order t1 left join litemall_user t2 on t1.user_id = t2.id
and t1.deleted = false
order by t1.add_time desc

SELECT COUNT(t1.id) FROM litemall_order t1 LEFT JOIN litemall_user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.id WHERE 1 = 1
and t1.order_sn = ${orderSn}
and t2.username like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
and t1.deleted = false

SELECT COUNT(t1.id) FROM litemall_order t1 WHERE 1 = 1
and t1.ship_sn = ${shipSn}

select t1.id, t1.user_id, t1.order_sn, t1.order_status, t1.consignee, t1.mobile, t1.address, t1. goods_price, t1.freight_price,t1.coupon_id, t1.coupon_price, t1.integral_price, t1.order_price, t1.actual_price, t1.pay_id, t1.pay_status, t1.pay_type,t1.ship_sn, t1.ship_channel, t1.ship_start_time, t1.ship_end_time, t1.confirm_time, t1.end_time, t1.add_time,t1.get_store_id, date_format(t1.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS "payTimeDisp", date_format(t1.ship_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS "shipStartTimeDisp", date_format(t1.ship_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS "shipEndTimeDisp", date_format(t1.confirm_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS "confirmTimeDisp", date_format(t1.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS "endTimeDisp", date_format(t1.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS "addTimeDisp", t1.deleted,t2.username as "username" from litemall_order t1 left join litemall_user t2 on t1.user_id = t2.id where t1.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
